channel.title: Hands-On on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Hands-On on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] [Hands-on for beginners] Kaggle's Predicting house prices is read line by line (1st part: Data reading)
item.description: # theme A job that operates a real estate system as a service, a story broke out that there is no loss in doing hands-on at the field level. That’s why we decided to challenge kaggle’s “House Price” problem, which is a famous title. So, if you make a note of this properly, it will be useful for later, so I decided to post it to qiita after reading the line by line.

item.title: [Python] Raspberry Pi
item.description: #00 Introduction *This article is the 7th day of Kinki University Advent Calendar 2019. *Basically, it is written for college students. This time, I will write on the assumption that RaspberryPi ZeroW which is cheap and suitable for trying is used, but you can do it with the same procedure for other RaspberryPi. *I rushed into some of the guys who were carrying a classmate who loves JavaScript. Gomenne By the way, haven’t you heard of RaspberryPi?
